Class MemoryLogSink

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Log sink that stores entries in memory for retrieval. Useful for displaying logs in UI or testing.

public sealed class MemoryLogSink : ILogSink
